description: Yoshino is Professor Sakuragi`s wife. Her children are Koharu and Sota. They live together at the Sakuragi Institute in Vermilion City. She went to the same high school as Professor Sakuragi where she was good at drawing and she really wanted to be a manga artist (漫画家). She found it to be hard work but Professor Sakuragi motivated her to continue working towards that goal.
name: Yoshino
